wikipedia_page.main:
Neil Hague (born 1 December 1949 in Thurcroft, Rotherham, South Yorkshire) is a former professional footballer, who played for Rotherham United, Plymouth Argyle, AFC Bournemouth, Huddersfield Town, and Darlington.
In 1980 he was contracted to play with ASL expansion team the Phoenix Fire, but the team folded in pre-season.
